{{Description|As the drums resound, as swords and halberds weave and clash, the doyenne is transformed into a mighty general.<br>As the instruments on stage strum in unison, lo, see how she vanquishes these demons!}}
'''Cliffbreaker's Banner''' is [[Yun Jin]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Normal Attack DMG increase provided by this talent is considered [[Additive Base DMG Bonus]] in the [[Damage#General Damage Formula|Damage Formula]].
* The Bonus DMG is applied every time a Normal Attack hits an enemy. For example, the 3-Hit of the Normal Attack sequence of [[Rosaria]] and [[Thoma]] hits the enemy twice, so Yun Jin's Bonus DMG will be applied twice for the 3-Hit of these characters.
* {{Talent Note|character=Yun Jin|talent=Cliffbreaker's Banner|dynamic buff|DEF}}
